name: Lost And Returned
description:
This was my submission for the 2021 Global Game Jam

You play as a security guard who is driving around the amusement park and is tasked with returning lost items to the park guests. Your golf cart can be a little drifty and guests get upset if you take too long so be quick and drive safe! Tips: - Use WASD or Arrow Keys to drive car around - Pick up items from the lost and found station - Return the items to park guests with that item icon floating above their head - Be fast or the timer will run out
